price: You are not asking them for any reward. It is only a reminder to the worlds.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
